remarks: Cancellation law for domains.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)
statement:
dmncan.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
dmncan.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
dmncan.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
dmncan.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
dmncan1 $p |- ( ( ( R e. Dmn /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) /\ A =/= Z ) -> ( ( A H B ) = ( A H C ) -> B = C ) ) $.
